fields.Recipes:
1. Peel plantains.
2. If using spices, mix together with oil and rub on plantain.
3. Grill on an open flame or in an over until golden brown, flipping occasionally.

fields.ingredients: Indomie Relish Chicken, Water, Pepper(Optional) , Carrots(Optional), Eggs
Rice, Fresh tomatoes, pepper, Tomato Paste, Oil, Salt, Curry, Thyme, Pepper, Beef
Croaker Fish, Pepper, Spring Onions, Seasoning, Garlic, Ginger, Salt, Oil
Pepper Soup Mix, Water, Pepper, Groundnut Oil, Seasoning, Cat Fish
3 cups all purpose flour, Oil for frying, 1/2 teaspoon Salt, 1/2 cup Sugar, 1 tablespoon yeast
fields.Recipes:
1. bloom yeast in 1/2 cup of lukewarm water and a tablespoon of sugar.
2. Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl.
3. Add yeast mixture to dry ingredient and stir in warm water until a smooth and lightly thick batter is formed (not a watery batter).
4. Leave to rest covered in a warm place until doubled in size.
5. Fry in hot oil until golden brown.

fields.ingredients: Indomie Relish Fish, Water, Pepper(Optional) , Carrots(Optional), Eggs

fields.Recipes:
1. Wash rice thoroughly to remove excess starch and leave to drain.
2. Add chicken to a pot with spices and oil to boil, fry chicken when done and keep stock aside.
3. In a pot, add oil and aromatics (onion, ginger, garlic, curry,bayleaves) and saute for a minute or 2
4. Add drained rice to oil with aromatics and fry until color of the rice changes slightly then add chicken stock to rice and leave to cook until done. add water if stock is not enough.
5. In another pan/pot, add oil and aromatics and saute for a 2 minutes, then add chopped vegetables, season and sautee for an additional 5 minutes.
6. Add sauted vegetables to cook rice and stir gently to combine.
7. Serve with fried chicken.

fields.ingredients: Eggs, Baby spinach, Red onion, Sardines, Sweet peppers, Salt
11/4 cup all purpose flour, 2 Eggs, 1 cup/200ml of Milk, 2 Tablespoons melted butter,2 Tablespoons Sugar (Optional), 2 teaspoon baking powder
fields.Recipes:
1. Sift dry ingredients into a bowl
2. In a separate bowl, combine milk, melted butter, vanilla and eggs
3. Add dry ingredients to wet and stir until combined (Do not over mix)
4. Leave to rest for a few minutes then fry in a lightly greased pan.
5. Serve hot with syrup and eggs or any topping of your choice.

fields.ingredients: Beans(washed and peeled), red bell pepper, red habanero pepper, onion, cayenne pepper, crayfish (optional), egg (optional), fish (optional), palm oil/groundnut oil.
fields.Recipes:
1. Add beans, peppers, onion and crayfish (if using) to a blender and blend till smooth.
2. Add pureed beans mixture to a bowl and season with seasoning cubes and salt to taste.
3. Add oil to mix and fillings (egg, fish) if using any.
4. wrap mixture individually in nylon bags or banana leaves and add to boiling water and cook for about 45 mins or until firm to the touch.

fields.ingredients: Pepper Soup Mix, Water, Pepper, Groundnut Oil, Seasoning, Goat Meat
Plantain, Palm Oil, Pepper, Onions, Maggi, Salt, Pumpkin Leaf, Beans(Optional)
Cassava, Palm Oil, Salt, Upkaka, Utazi, Kpomo(Optional), Onions, Crayfish, Ogili

fields.Recipes:
1. Blend beans and listed ingredients together into a fine paste
2. Boil the oil
3. Pour the blended beans mix into the oil in scopes to form individual balls
4. Take out the akara once it looks brownish
